resources.string:
Pixabay App is a clean and efficient Android application built as a convenient interface for accessing the Pixabay API. It provides a fast, modern, and easy-to-use experience for discovering and browsing free images and videos from Pixabayâ€™s vast library.

This app is an independent, community-driven project and is not officially affiliated with Pixabay.com. It was created purely for educational and non-commercial purposes.

Developed by Ahmadrezagh671@gmail.com
